## Properties

| Property      | Attribute     | Description       | Type      | Default     |
| ------------- | ------------- | ----------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `disabled`    | `disabled`    | Input error state | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `error`       | `error`       | Input error state | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `label`       | `label`       | Input label       | `string`  | `''`        |
| `message`     | `message`     | Input helper text | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `name`        | `name`        | Input name        | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `placeholder` | `placeholder` | Input placeholder | `string`  | `''`        |
| `required`    | `required`    | Input required    | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `type`        | `type`        | Input type        | `string`  | `'text'`    |
| `value`       | `value`       | Input value       | `string`  | `''`        |
